body: I’ve noticed something about Cloud x Sephiroth Doujins, and that’s that they’re more artistic than other Doujins. Most Doujins are like: “Oh yeah! You’re pounding my ass so hard! I can feel your dick twitch inside of me! Pour all of your seed in me!” and just going into levels of detail that are borderline awkward sometimes, with sweat and cum all over the panels. Where as these are more reserved and almost poetic in a way.
